== Puthuppariyaram (CT) (627648) ==

Puthuppariyaram (CT) is a town in the [[Palakkad]] taluka of [[Palakkad]] district with an area of 5.9 sq. km. and harbouring 7272 households with total population of 30895 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Palakkad]] is at a distance of 7 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 375 km. Male population is 14995 and female population is 15900. Scheduled Caste population is 3618 and Scheduled Tribes population is 377. Census Location Code of the town is 627648<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Palakkad (m) at a distance of 7 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Coimbatore(m corp. )  at a distance of 46 km. Railway station is at Palakkad junction at a distance of 2 km.
